duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise, monitor, and direct all activities, workflow, service, and transactional management of PIA Implementation Coordinator team within Health & Benefits team in the Paychex Insurance Agency.
Provide direct supervision for a staff of PIA Implementation Coordinators and successful onboarding of new clients to the Health and Benefits product.
Support District and Market Sales Managers as well as regional Service and Retention Managers by supporting the onboarding and transition process from sales to operations.
Maintain and foster carrier relationships to ensure prompt and efficient service to their assigned client team based on follow-up and issue resolution needs.
Define and establish productivity and quality standards, and ensure they are met.
Assist in the establishment of policies and implements all policies and procedures relating to the workflow of the assigned team to ensure timely and accurate service.
Maintain compliance with state, federal, and insurance carrier guidelines, as well as standards set forth within the Agency, and HRS to ensure product and team integrity.

Review business processes to ensure accuracy, efficiency in productivity measures, and adherence to internal and external client service level standards, as well as recommends the necessary changes to maintain a competitive advantage.
Recruit, select, hire, and evaluate performance of personnel to ensure all department needs are handled appropriately.
Assist Agency management to achieve budgeted projections through labor expense and administrative expense controls.
Life, Accident and Health must be obtained within 90 days of employment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Insurance, Sales, or Customer Service (Master's preferred)
Relevant Insurance License (Life, Accident and Health)
